subject: Sales
title: The World's First Salespeople
description: Learn The World's First Salespeople in one minute.

hook.text: Forty thousand years ago, humans traded obsidian blades across hundreds of miles. Sales predates writing.

buildup.text: Before coins or contracts, people exchanged goods based on trust, reputation, and storytelling.

discovery.text: Archaeologists found trade networks spanning continents. Persuasion was the original human currency.

twist.text: The first sellers had no scripts or CRMs. They had reputation â€” and that was everything they needed.

climax.text: The tools evolve endlessly. The instinct to trade value for value has been human since the beginning.

punchline.text: Selling is as old as humanity itself.
